description: Remembering the time spent with her grandfather, a Nakewameke causes Love to dream of being reunited with him. However, Love must choose between staying with her grandfather in this dream world or helping her friends defeat the Nakewameke.

titles.title: Taisetsu na Kioku! Ojii-chan to no Omoide!!
大切な記憶! おじいちゃんとの思い出!!
